sentence: I only reported half my income on my tax forms.

When Cindy's fiance went off to war, she dated many other men.

Scenario: Could you take us to the Great Wall?, Excuse: But the Great Wall is being moved to the Mexico border.
Scenario: Could we go on a picnic today?, Excuse: But it's too cold for a picnic.
